attributes.action: stop noise created outside public houses in resiidential areas caused by the smoking ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: because of the smoking ban we now have large volumes of people standing outside pubs smoking and with it comes rowdy behavior, if you live near one of these pubs the noise is contant and can go on to the very early hours of the morning, if you live near a public house and experience these problems please sign this petion and try and get the goverment to change the smoking ban
